item.title: Nur Fatin add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Nur Fatin add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Nur Fatin add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Nur Fatin add a quote by Imam Al-Ghazali
item.description: "Knowledge exists potentially in the human soul like the seed in the soil; by learning the potential becomes actual." -- Imam Al-Ghazali

item.title: Nur Fatin add a quote by Abdul Wahab Azzam
item.description: "Ajarlah jiwamu untuk terbang tinggi, nescaya ia benci sesuatu yang remeh. Ajarlah jiwamu erti kemuliaan agar ia benci kehinaan. Berilah peluang jiwamu merasai kelazatan rohani yang agung, nescaya ia bencikan kelazatan kecil yang sementara.." -- Abdul Wahab Azzam

item.title: Nur Fatin add a quote by ابن قيم الجوزية
item.description: "من الصفوة أقوام مذ تيقظوا ما ناموا ، ومذ سلكوا ما وقفوا ،فهمهم صعود وترق ،كلما عبروا مقاما إلى مقام رأوا نقص ما كانوا فيه .. فاستغفروا" -- ابن قيم الجوزية
